The posts on Facebook and Twitter show p: 2. The photos were traced back to an article published by local news organization Rappler on December 26, 2016, which states that the photos show Duterte celebrating his first Christmas as president at his home.
A Facebook post on December 27: 2016, also shared the same photos, with a caption emphasizing Duterte's simplicity and contrasting it with the elitists and paid media.
The tweet: when translated to English, describes Duterte as a simple person wearing sandals, helping out in the kitchen, and talking to maids, and expresses love and blessings for him as the President of the Philippines.
